pfFormGroup
directive in module patternfly.form

Description

Encapsulates the structure and styling for a label + input used within a Bootstrap3 based form.

This directive creates new scope.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY pf-form-group
     pf-label="{string}"
     pf-field-id="{string}"
     pf-label-class="{string}"
     pf-input-class="{string}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
pfLabelstring

the text for the

pfFieldIdstring

the id of the form field. Default value is id of the form field element.

pfLabelClassstring

the class of the label element. Default value is "col-sm-2".

pfInputClassstring

the class of the input element. Default value is "col-sm-5".
